name: cargo_audit
description: Audit Cargo.lock for crates with security vulnerabilities

hints.default: Auditing dependencies for security vulnerabilities... an important step for secure software.

subcommand.name: default
subcommand.description: Audit Cargo.lock for crates with security vulnerabilities (if installed).

options.name: ignore
options.description: Advisory id to ignore (can be specified multiple times)

options.name: target-arch
options.description: filter vulnerabilities by CPU (default: no filter). Can be specified multiple times

options.name: target-os
options.description: filter vulnerabilities by OS (default: no filter). Can be specified multiple times
